comment: I really enjoyed Dr. Casey's class, attendance isn't mandatory but I would still recommend since she makes lectures fun and interesting. Only 4 papers and 3 tests which she reviews the tests before the exam day. She knows a lot about clinical psychology and is passionate about it!

Dr. Casey was such a sweet professor. She is a practicing therapist and is able to give a lot of great advice and information about counseling psychology. There are 4 small papers and 3 exams. She grades very liberally and she goes through the test on review day and gives the questions and their answers. Wish I could take this class again.
